name: cordova-plugin-wkwebview-polyfill
description: This plugin does nothing at all.
author: busenm

scripts.tamper-android: node tests/tamper/android.js && jarsigner -verbose -keystore $HOME/.android/debug.keystore -storepass android -keypass android $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/tests/android-tampered.apk androiddebugkey
scripts.tamper-ios: node tests/tamper/ios.js && cd $ANTITAMPERING_TEST_DIR/platforms/ios/build/emulator && zip -r $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/tests/ios-tampered.zip HelloWorld.app && cd $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR
